page.title: 13Health Doctors,Droxford race
page.content: My Dad is one of 5 Doctors who care for people in Wickham,Droxford & close villages.The surgery is in High St. Most people visit the surgery if they are ill.Doctors visit elderly and very ill people at home.If people are very sick or need an operation they are sent to Winchester,Portsmouth some_ times Southampton.In August people will have to make an appointment to see the Dr.They can get their pre _ scriptions from the Pharmacy in the waiting room.There are lots of other people who go to visit sick people:the Midwife for someone who is going to have a baby,the District Nurse and the Health Visitor.Once a month a Chiro_ podist comes to the village hall.The Baby Clinic is held there once a month 15th June{Droxford 10km. road race}had over 70 runners.They like the 4 miles up hill because scenery is "stunning"
